section.p:
The forest is inhabited by a malevolent unseen spirit that is slowly leeching your life-energy.
Lose 1 point from all your abilities
(CHARISMA, COMBAT, MAGIC, etc). No ability can go lower than 1. In addition, you lose 1-6 Stamina points (the roll of one die).

You realize you must muster a burst of effort to break out of the wood before you are lost forever.
Make a SCOUTING roll at a Difficulty of 17 .
